title: Source code copyright years not updated when source updated
body:
by **MarkHkamp**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Method 1:
1. Browse the Go source.
2. Look at about any file.
3. Check the copyright notice.

Method 2:
1. Browse the source code changes list at http://code.google.com/p/go/source/list.
2. Select virtually any revision.
3. Select "diff" next to anything listed under "Affected files".

What is the expected output?
Copyright [file's creation year] - [file's latest change year] .....

What do you see instead?
Copyright [file's creation year]

Please provide any additional information below.
This only affects the pedantic.
